content: to end of row tight fit using tapestry needle and a length of yarn sew row 2 *p1 sl1wyib repeat from * to end of row the cast on edge of the center tie to the bound off edge row 3-12 repeat row 1 and 2 five more times adjust the way that everything has bunched up in the row 13 k1 sl1wyif 9 times k2tog 19 sts middle under the center tie row 14 sl1 p1 sl1wyib 9 times sew your bow to a barrette clip or hair elastic to use as a row 15 k1 sl1wyif 9 times k1 hair accessory finishing photos tails piece finished shape loops piece folded so that cast on edge meets bound off edge tails piece folded in half longer corners towards the center sew these two edges together neatness doesn t matter much because this will be concealed by the center tie center tie piece stacked on top of loops piece stacked on top of tails piece completed view from back center tie piece is wrapped around both loops piece and tails piece cast on edge of center tie piece is sewn to the bound off edge questions comments email yarniganrachel@gmail com or contact through ravelry username raborello copyright © 2024 all rights reserved
